name: Access Service Request Number
title: ASR NO
definition: Identifies the number that may be generated by the provider mechanized systems, pre-assigned to the customer by the provider, or manually assigned by the provider to identify a customer's request for service.
usageNotes: Required when ASR NO is pre-assigned.
Required on all supplements when PON is not unique.
fieldNotes: This entry must be identical to the ASR NO field entry on the ASR Form.
